mapper.select: SELECT MEDIUMCATE, LARGECATE, MCNAME FROM MEDIUMCATE WHERE LARGECATE = #{largeCate}
SELECT MEDIUMCATE FROM MEDIUMCATE WHERE MCNAME=#{mcName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT VALUES(SEQ_PRODUCTNO.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productSummary}, #{productContent}, #{productImg}, #{productStatus}, #{productStock}, #{price}, TO_NUMBER(#{mediumCate}), SYSDATE, #{defCycle} )
INSERT INTO MEDIUMCATE VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(MEDIUMCATE)+1,0) FROM MEDIUMCATE),#{mcName},#{largeCate},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.* FROM PRODUCT P, MEDIUMCATE M WHERE PRODUCTNO=#{no} AND P.MEDIUMCATE=M.MEDIUMCATE
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCTNAME=#{productName}, PRODUCTSUMMARY=#{productSummary}, PRODUCTCONTENT=#{productContent}, PRODUCTIMG=#{productImg}, PRODUCTSTATUS=#{productStatus}, PRODUCTSTOCK=#{productStock}, PRICE=#{price}, MEDIUMCATE=#{mediumCate}, DEFCYCLE=#{defCycle} WHERE PRODUCTNO=#{productNo}
